data.name: project_entry
data.description: Run when entering a new project directory to work on it

items.text: Check for CONSTITUTION.md in project root
If constitution exists, read and load as context
If no constitution, analyze: architecture.md, data-model.md, CLAUDE.md, sprint docs
If no constitution, create CONSTITUTION.md with: identity, constraints, laws, axes, gates, deferred scope
Check for CLAUDE.md or AGENTS.md for project-specific instructions
Identify tech stack and dev commands
